summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 1300, entitled "An Ordinance granting to Nils B. Peterson, his heirs, executors, administrators, and assigns the right to lay water-pipes within the City of Seattle in the streets and alleys within the area bounded by and including First, Williard, Illinois and Wharf Streets and Railroad Avenue, and in the streets and alleys in the 2nds Supplemental Plat to Crown Addition to Seattle", approved February 24, 1890.
